articles.author: The White House
articles.title: Statement from President Joe Biden on Supreme Court Decision on Student Loan Debt Relief - The White House
articles.description: This fight is not over. I will have more to announce when I address the nation this afternoon. My Administration’s student debt relief plan would have been the lifeline tens of millions of hardworking Americans needed as they try to recover from a once-in-a-c…
articles.content:
